channel.title: Click me please -no haters-
channel.description:
Hey guys i need help with my server i am almost finished with it, ive changed the ip in every folder needed and ive port forward and i checked on canyouseeme.org and its saying success, now how ever its sayting error connecting to server, if you have any idea's on how to fix this problem please reply, i would greatly appreciated it
-James

item.title: Click me please -no haters-
item.dc:creator: @james11112 james11112
item.description:
@james11112 wrote:

what do u mean about “method” this?

public static String findcachedir() {
String as[] = {"./"};
if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34)
storeid = 32;
String s = “hybridpvpnetcache”;
for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++)
try {
String s1 = as[i];
if(s1.length() > 0) {
File file = new File(s1);
if(!file.exists())
continue;
}
File file1 = new File(s1 + s);
if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir())
return s1 + s + “/”;
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
return null;
}

public static String sencondDir() {
	File file = new File("C:/hybridpvpnetcache/");
	if (!file.exists())
		file.mkdir();
	return file.toString();
}

private static int getuid(String s) {
    return 234523;
}

public static synchronized Socket opensocket(int i)
    throws IOException
{
    for(socketreq = i; socketreq != 0;)
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }

    if(socket == null)
        throw new IOException("could not open socket");
    else
        return socket;
}

public static synchronized DataInputStream openurl(String s)
    throws IOException
{
    for(urlreq = s; urlreq != null;)
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }

    if(urlstream == null)
        throw new IOException("could not open: " + s);
    else
        return urlstream;
}

public static synchronized void dnslookup(String s)
{
    dns = s;
    dnsreq = s;
}

public static synchronized void startthread(Runnable runnable, int i)
{
    threadreqpri = i;
    threadreq = runnable;
}

        return false;

item.title: Click me please -no haters-
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“james11112, post:1, topic:402241”]Hey guys i need help with my server i am almost finished with it, ive changed the ip in every folder needed and ive port forward and i checked on canyouseeme.org and its saying success, now how ever its sayting error connecting to server, if you have any idea’s on how to fix this problem please reply,
i would greatly appreciated it

-James[/quote]

  1. got to http://www.canyouseeme.org/
  2. Type in your port into the textbox
  3. Click the button
  4. If it says it can’t see your computer, you haven’t forwarded properly.

Read full topic
